description.zh-cn: 中国学者，安徽师范大学教授，享受国务院政府特殊津贴专家。
description.en: A Chinese scholar, professor at Anhui Normal University, and an expert receiving the special government allowance of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国安徽省合肥市下辖县。
description.en: A county under the administration of Hefei City, Anhui Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国安徽省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Anhui Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党执政。
description.en: A country in East Asia governed by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国安徽省芜湖市的一所大学。
description.en: A university located in Wuhu, Anhui Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国四川省成都市的一所大学。
description.en: A university located in Chengdu, Sichuan Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国江苏省南京市的一所大学。
description.en: A university located in Nanjing, Jiangsu Province, China.

en: Special government allowances of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院对于高层次专业技术人才和高技能人才的一种奖励制度。
description.en: A reward system of the State Council of the People's Republic of China for high-level professional and technical talents and highly skilled talents.

description.zh-cn: 安徽师范大学下属的学院。
description.en: A college affiliated with Anhui Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 胡传志出生于安徽省庐江县。
description.en: Hu Chuanzhi was born in Lujiang County, Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 胡传志是中华人民共和国国籍。
description.en: Hu Chuanzhi is a citizen of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 胡传志是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Hu Chuanzhi is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1985年毕业于安徽师范大学中文系。
description.en: Graduated from the Department of Chinese at Anhui Normal University in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 1988年于四川大学获硕士学位。
description.en: Received a master's degree from Sichuan University in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 1993年于南京大学获博士学位。
description.en: Received a doctoral degree from Nanjing University in 1993.

description.zh-cn: 1988年起任教于安徽师范大学。
description.en: Began teaching at Anhui Normal University in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 曾任安徽师范大学文学院院长。
description.en: Once served as the Dean of the School of Chinese Language and Literature at Anhui Normal University.

relationships.target: 安徽师范大学研究生院

description.zh-cn: 曾任安徽师范大学研究生院院长。
description.en: Once served as the Dean of the Graduate School at Anhui Normal University.

relationships.target: 安徽师范大学中国诗学研究中心

description.zh-cn: 现任安徽师范大学中国诗学研究中心主任。
description.en: Currently serves as the Director of the Center for Chinese Poetics Studies at Anhui Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 享受国务院政府特殊津贴专家。
description.en: An expert who enjoys the special government allowances of the State Council.
